arts.ttl: Mallorca manager discusses Real Madrid’s changes under Alonso – ‘They’ve been very dominant’
arts.sum: After back-to-back wins against Osasuna and Real Oviedo in La Liga, Real Madrid will gear up for their strongest challenge yet as they take on RCD Mallorca in their third match. arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid squad list to face RCD Mallorca | La Liga MD3
arts.sum: Real Madrid will be gunning for their third La Liga win of the new season when they take on RCD Mallorca on Saturday night at the Santiago Bernabeu. arts.ttl: Alonso talks Vinicius, Ceballos, Valverde, Camavinga, Huijsen, Rodrygo ahead of Real Madrid vs Mallorca
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Xabi Alonso faced the media ahead of his team’s upcoming La Liga home fixture against Mallorca on Saturday. The manager addressed several key topics, from Vinicius Jr.’s form and contract situation to the squad’s balance and the impact of the Champions League draw.
